turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with ordering from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, got it. and what size would you prefer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, Venti. Did you want whip cream with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem. Any substitutes for the milk? or is regular fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I would also like the temperature to be extra hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1% skim milk. sure! And Extra hot, noted.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add any additional sweteners?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a Venti Cinnamon Shortbread Latte, with 1% milk and extra hot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly. No. That's That That was correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much, I appreciate your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, and where would you like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get it on the Old York Road location in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem. give me a moment to send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're all set! your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 10-11 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you so much for your help.
